easy.q: I have a face but no eyes. I tell time every day. What am I?
easy.hint: It hangs on the wall or sits on a desk.

medium.q: I am a word of letters three; add two, and fewer there will be. What word am I?

hard.q: I am always hungry, I must be fed. The finger I touch will soon turn red. What am I?
hard.hint: It grows as you give it fuel.
